content: Hey, just to be 100% clear, MedicationStatement got dropped from USCore from 3 -> 3.1?
That would be a surprise to me

shows up here: https://www.hl7.org/fhir/us/core/STU3/profiles.html
but not here: https://www.hl7.org/fhir/us/core/profiles.html
Correct. MedicationStatement is dropped in the latest release -- see Medication list guidance for an extended discussion.
It is gone and it will stay gone? (just double checking, we are about to axe it from our R4 implementation)

Sounds like it is gone from the R4-based version, but the footnote at http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/all-meds.html#fn:1 states:

It is anticipated that there will be further changes to the medication resources in future versions of FHIR which may lead to changes in our guidance for fetching patient medications in future versions of this guide.
Thanks @Vassil Peytchev - did not notice that. But as long as the changes are for future FHIR versions we should be OK axing it in R4 I guess
MedicationStatement as we know it is gone-gone. In latest continuous build there is a rename to MedicationUsage which may be considered after R5 is released.
